Class AbstractReportMojoEx

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
org.apache.maven.reporting.AbstractMavenReport
io.github.weblegacy.maven.plugin.taglib.AbstractReportMojo
io.github.weblegacy.maven.plugin.taglib.AbstractReportMojoEx
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextEnabled, Mojo, MavenMultiPageReport, MavenReport
Direct Known Subclasses:
TagreferenceMojo, ValidateMojo
public abstract class AbstractReportMojoEx extends AbstractReportMojo
An extended abstract class for the Mojos of this plugin.
Author:
ste-gr

  • Field Details

    • srcDir

      @Parameter(alias="taglib.src.dir", defaultValue="src/main/resources/META-INF") protected File srcDir
      Directory containing tld files. Subdirectories are also processed, unless the dontRecurseIntoSubdirs parameter is set.

    • loadTldFiles

      protected List<Tld> loadTldFiles() throws MavenReportException
      Loads all tld files from the srcDir.
      Returns:
      all loaded tld files
      Throws:
      MavenReportException - if an error occurs during execution
